mapper.select: SELECT B.ireview, A.nm, B.product_score, B.contents, DATE_FORMAT(B.created_at, '%Y-%m-%d') as created_at, B.req_review_pic ,P.product_nm FROM t_user AS A JOIN t_review AS B ON A.iuser = B.iuser JOIN t_review AS C ON B.ireview = C.ireview JOIN t_product P ON P.iproduct = B.iproduct WHERE B.iproduct = #{iproduct} ORDER BY B.created_at DESC LIMIT #{startIdx}, #{rowCount}
